page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I am Lisa Gigli aged 10 yrs. At 7 a.m. I get up, get dressed, go downstairs, and eat my breakfast. I walk to school t half past eight. We go into the hall and listen to Mr. Hoyle who puts on the tape "The Magic Finger". Then we do our Drama, Maths and English.After dinner we do the Domesday Project, then Games. I go home at 3.30p.m. At 6.30p.m. I go to Morris Dancing practice with my partner Esther Merring. I am Richard Lamoury aged 9 yrs. On Friday I get up at 8a.m.,wash,dress, and have my breakfast. I go to school with Michael Costain. We do S.M.P.Maths till break when I play football, skip- ping,or bulldogs.I do S.R.A.Power Builders, and record pages. We do Science,have Assembly,then a Radio pro- gramme.After school I play outdoors, until tea.I play until 9,& go to bed at 10.00 p.m.
